My Projects

I know, I know, it’s not the Netflix catalog of projects yet, but hey, greatness takes time! Most of these are still “work-in-progress” (aka me battling bugs at 2 AM), but I promise I’ll blow your mind soon (hopefully). Stick around; we’re just getting started!

2025 Ongoing

Automated Expense Tracker

Preview Linkedin
Google Forms
Google Sheets
Make.com
Open AI

My attempt at developing an automated experience by building an expense tracking system using Google Forms, Google Sheets, and Make.com. The system collects user inputs using Google forms ( I had to start somewhere ) , categorizes expenses, sends email notifications, and provides summaries through an email. I have a lot to do and this is an ongoing project. Check out the LinkedIn project for more details.

2024 - 2025 Ongoing

Real Time Threat Detection System

Preview LinkedIn
Python
Yolo v8
CNN
Deep Learning

The Major Project I'm developing in my College focuses on real-time threat detection using YOLO v8 and Convolutional Neural Networks. This deep learning project aims to identify potential security risks through video analysis, with a specific focus on detecting suspicious behavior and potential threats. Currently in development, this system will integrate with existing security infrastructure to provide automated alerts and monitoring capabilities.

2024

Museum of Candy

Preview Github
HTML-5
CSS-3

A simple project to showcase the power of HTML and CSS. This project demonstrates how to create a visually appealing and responsive webpage using only HTML and CSS, without any additional frameworks or libraries. The project includes a clean layout, modern design elements, and interactive features achieved purely through CSS styling.
